title: Streamlined UI Enhances Clarity and Usability

topics.title: Download Comparison Enhancements
topics.summary: The configuration of client-side limits for file comparisons has been improved, allowing for better handling of large files. Additionally, registered anomalies are now displayed as dashed segments on download charts, enhancing data visualization.

topics.title: UI Improvements
topics.summary: Recent updates include truncating long package names on the profile likes page and adding a subheading to clarify weekly downloads. These enhancements aim to improve user experience by ensuring information is presented clearly and concisely.

topics.title: Issue Resolution
topics.summary: An issue regarding weekly downloads not refreshing when the version changes has been closed. This resolution ensures that users can see accurate download statistics for the selected version, improving the reliability of the data presented.

topics.title: Community Engagement
topics.summary: Community members are actively discussing improvements and features related to download charts on platforms like Bluesky. These discussions highlight user interest in enhancing the functionality and usability of npmx.dev.
